languages.text: {n}Тонкая улыбка касается бледных губ Владайма.{/n} "Конечно, Ваша Светлость. А теперь — к делам насущным?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Тонкая улыбка касается бледных губ Владайма.{/n} "Конечно, Ваша Светлость. А теперь — к делам насущным?"

languages.text: {n}A ghost of a smile appears on Vladaym's pale lips.{/n} "Of course, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And now — shall we discuss more pressing matters?"
languages.original_text: {n}Тонкая улыбка касается бледных губ Владайма.{/n} "Конечно, Ваша Светлость. А теперь — к делам насущным?"

traits.locale_text: {n}A ghost of a thin smile appears on Vladaym's pale lips.{/n} "Of course, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And now — shall we discuss more pressing matters?"
{n}A ghost of a thin smile appears on Vladaym's pale lips.{/n} "Of course, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And now — shall we discuss more pressing matters?"

{n}A ghost of a smile appears on Vladaym's pale lips.{/n} "Of course, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And now — shall we discuss more pressing matters?"
{n}A ghost of a smile appears on Vladaym's pale lips.{/n} "Of course, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And now — shall we discuss more pressing matters?"

languages.text: {n}ヴラダイムは青白い唇が幽霊じみた笑顔を作る。{/n}「もちろんだとも、マイ・{mf|ロード|レディ}。それでは、もっと差し迫った問題について話し合おうか?」
languages.original_text: {n}A ghost of a smile appears on Vladaym's pale lips.{/n} "Of course, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And now — shall we discuss more pressing matters?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴラダイムは青白い唇が幽霊じみた笑顔を作る。{/n}「もちろんだとも、マイ・{mf|ロード|レディ}。それでは、もっと差し迫った問題について話し合おうか?」

languages.text: {n}弗拉迪姆苍白的嘴唇上露出一丝微笑。{/n}“当然，大人。既然如此，我们要不要讨论更加重要的事情？”
languages.original_text: {n}A ghost of a smile appears on Vladaym's pale lips.{/n} "Of course, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And now — shall we discuss more pressing matters?"

traits.locale_text: {n}弗拉迪姆苍白的嘴唇上露出一丝微笑。{/n}“当然，大人。既然如此，我们要不要讨论更加重要的事情？”

languages.text: {n}Un intento de sonrisa aparece en los pálidos labios de Vladaym.{/n} «Por supuesto, {mf|milord|milady}. Bueno, ¿pasamos a asuntos más apremiantes?».
languages.original_text: {n}A ghost of a smile appears on Vladaym's pale lips.{/n} "Of course, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And now — shall we discuss more pressing matters?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Un intento de sonrisa aparece en los pálidos labios de Vladaym.{/n} «Por supuesto, {mf|milord|milady}. Bueno, ¿pasamos a asuntos más apremiantes?».

languages.text: {n}L'esquisse d'un sourire apparaît sur les lèvres pâles de Vladaym.{/n} « Bien sûr, Votre Seigneurie. Et maintenant, que diriez-vous d'aborder des sujets plus urgents ? »
languages.original_text: {n}A ghost of a smile appears on Vladaym's pale lips.{/n} "Of course, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And now — shall we discuss more pressing matters?"

traits.locale_text: {n}L'esquisse d'un sourire apparaît sur les lèvres pâles de Vladaym.{/n} « Bien sûr, Votre Seigneurie. Et maintenant, que diriez-vous d'aborder des sujets plus urgents ? »

languages.text: {n}Der Geist eines Lächelns erscheint auf Vladaym blassen Lippen.{/n} "Natürlich, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Wollen wir nun über dringlichere Angelegenheiten sprechen?"
languages.original_text: {n}A ghost of a smile appears on Vladaym's pale lips.{/n} "Of course, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And now — shall we discuss more pressing matters?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Geist eines Lächelns erscheint auf Vladaym blassen Lippen.{/n} "Natürlich, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Wollen wir nun über dringlichere Angelegenheiten sprechen?"

languages.text: {n}Vladaym'ın solgun dudaklarında bir gülümseme emaresi beliriyor.{/n} "Elbette {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Artık daha acil konulardan konuşalım mı?"
languages.original_text: {n}A ghost of a smile appears on Vladaym's pale lips.{/n} "Of course, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And now — shall we discuss more pressing matters?"
